/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC   -D_XOPEN_SOURCE=600 -Wl,-rpath,.   -shared -Wl,-soname,libtools.so -o ../lib/libtools.so CMakeFiles/tools.dir/tools.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/tools_stdafx.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/date/date.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/threading/PosixThreadImpl.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/threading/ThreadHandle.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/threading/PosixCondVarWrapper.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/win_emul/CWinEventHandle.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/mutex/Mutex.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/win_emul/winevent.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tools.dir/win_emul/winCRTsecure.cpp.o -lrt -lpthread
